channel.title: Having Trouble Running My Servers
channel.description:
So recently my IP address changed, I went to my linksys website and editted the IP to portforward to as well as no-ip.com. It is all editted and my IP matches the IP's on the linksys site and no-ip site. Still not working. I have my client connected to my server ip (noblescape.no-ip.org) and it works fine for me when I connect but my friend tried connecting and no luck, I used 2 sources also, still had troubles for both. My port is 43594, I have it added to my windows firewall to allowed. I checked the server.java file and it is set to 43594 as the source. My client connects to noblescape.no-ip.org on port 43594.
The source I downloaded is http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,492527.0.html Please someone help me out! Please I am begging you! Tell me what to do!!
EDIT: I have disabled my antivirus program and double checked all my IPs, they all match up to be the same so I don't understand why it's not working. My servers used to work :(

item.title: Having Trouble Running My Servers
item.dc:creator: @noblehalo27 noblehalo27
item.description:
@noblehalo27 wrote:

runewings317:

Do you have your firewall port opened?

Yes, oh shit. I got Panda Cloud Antivirus, do you think maybe that’s blocking the connection?

Read full topic
